channel.title: NAS:YORK on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NAS:YORK on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump Media Partners With Crypto.com on Crypto Treasury
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. and Crypto.com agreed to a deal with blank-check vehicle Yorkville Acquisition Corp. to create a crypto treasury company focused on buying and holding CRO toke
